name: hotpot
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a mixture of meat and vegetables, sometimes including sliced potatoes, cooked slowly in a covered dish inside an oven, or in a special heated pan : Lancashire hotpot A traditional hot pot is exactly what you want on a chilly day.
Olga Mazyarkina/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
a dish of thinly sliced meat, fish, and vegetables cooked in broth (= thin soup) that is kept boiling in a large pan on the table : Every city has its speciality, from Beijing duck in the capital to bubbling hot pot in Sichuan. The spicy tofu hotpot has a soup base. Mongolian hot pot is known for its flavourful broth, which contains ingredients like goji berries and a mix of herbs.
More examplesFewer examplesI think that vegetarian hotpot is just as good as the original.A hot pot is a great dish for family meals as you can put it in the middle of the table, and everyone can help themselves.Mongolian hot pot involves various pieces of seafood, poultry, and meat cooked in a communal pot of simmering stock.
